EntryName	PP13G_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein phosphatase 1 regulatory subunit 3G
GeneName	PPP1R3G
Length	358
Function	Glycogen-targeting subunit for protein phosphatase 1 (PP1). Involved in the regulation of hepatic glycogenesis in a manner coupled to the fasting-feeding cycle and distinct from other glycogen-targeting subunits (By similarity).
